item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Friday, March 28, 2025 at 3:00 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A decompilation and port of Sonic Advance 2-a GameBoy Advance game written in C (11 points | discuss)
2. Apple needs a Snow Sequoia (384 points | 273 comments)
3. Things I would have told myself before building an autorouter (50 points | 7 comments)
4. A note on the USB-to-PS/2 mouse adapter that came with Microsoft mouse devices (67 points | 12 comments)
5. Tracing the thoughts of a large language model (593 points | 241 comments)
6. Using uv and PEP 723 for Self-Contained Python Scripts (22 points | 7 comments)
7. How to Use Em Dashes (–), En Dashes (–), and Hyphens (-) (254 points | 196 comments)
8. Arctic sea ice sets a record low maximum in 2025 (34 points | 17 comments)
9. Learning Theory from First Principles [pdf] (87 points | 9 comments)
10. Helpcare AI (YC F24) Is Hiring ( | hide)
11. Most promoted and blocked domains on Kagi (161 points | 59 comments)
12. I genuinely don't understand why some people are still bullish about LLMs (215 points | 367 comments)
13. Anti-Orbit Laser Submarines (2017) (17 points | 1 comment)
14. Launch HN: Continue (YC S23) – Create custom AI code assistants (145 points | 97 comments)
15. Piranesi's Perspective Trick (2019) (321 points | 72 comments)
16. Blasting Past WebP - An analysis of the NSO BLASTPASS iMessage exploit (233 points | 96 comments)
17. Emacs Solo: A Surprise System Crafters Live Demo (49 points | 2 comments)
18. Golang on the Playstation 2 (41 points | discuss)
19. Asking good questions is harder than giving great answers (81 points | 10 comments)
20. Clean, a formal verification DSL for ZK circuits in Lean4 (60 points | 2 comments)
21. What it takes to add a new back end to Futhark (11 points | discuss)
22. First-of-its-kind trial enables paralysed man to stand via stem cell injection (134 points | 25 comments)
23. The Unbearable Loudness of Chewing (28 points | 23 comments)
24. Take this on-call rotation and shove it (129 points | 92 comments)
25. I tried making artificial sunlight at home (277 points | 152 comments)
26. Dagger: A shell for the container age (150 points | 85 comments)
27. AI models miss disease in Black and female patients (261 points | 207 comments)
28. Better Shell History Search (18 points | 13 comments)
29. How I pwned a major New Zealand service provider (38 points | 34 comments)
30. Show HN: Built an MCP server for direct sound design on my hardware synth (5 points | 1 comment)
